posts.postText:
Alright so, my finals are next week, and I won't be on a lot if at all during them. Some of my grades are borderline C's and my parents act as if I'm asian and expect me to get straight A's and B's. So yeah.


For the summer, nothing is for sure, but I may only be on 4 days a week if that. That means in-game moderating, I'll most liekly be on the forums all the time (through my phone). So yeah, I just wanted to give you a heads up for MY inactivity in the near future. 

Also, I guess I'll change the name of this to everyones doings of this summer, since I don't want it to be about just me.

Probably active.

I need to find a job this summer, so I may be on less... but still active more than likely.
I'll try to be active tho I probably won't as much, working on college app and money aid, along with finding a job.

>> my parents act as if I'm asian and expect me to get straight A's and B's. So yeah. My parents are the same. =| I got 1 C last year because of this faggot at my school that screwed my whole class over (long story) and they tend to bring it up whenever they can >_>. Other than that i got A's and a few B's.
As far as the OP goes, I'm trying to find a job/volunteering place like everyone (no luck) but other than that, i'll be active as far as my current complicated position goes.
Active all the way unless something pops up.
For me it's really just unpredictable.
I've had a part time job at kiddy land since last summer. I'll be on all the time except when I'm working
